name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
desc: After winning a battle, revive all downed characters in the current team and restore their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered 1 time(s)
bg_desc: This heart-shaped fruit comes from a tree blessed by Yaoshi and is supposedly 50 Amber Eras old. It is unclear whether the fruit would give immortality to those who eat it, but the tree itself is definitely an immortal abomination.
